long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Unify extension provides access to the Unify Google Chrome and Microsoft Edge browser application download that enable users to launch communicate with locally installed applications like Xi-View™ Pro without the need for Microsoft Silverlight dependencies. Unify is a best practice platform – a foundation with building blocks providing the application you desire based on your specifications, to meet your workflow, productivity and business needs.
